titleCards.name: Mist-Walker
titleCards.description: After a hero explores a tile, you may remove this skill from the adventure to place your hero on any space of that tile.

titleCards.name: Stone-Talker
titleCards.description: During your turn, you may remove this skill from the adventure to choose a space and apply stun to each enemy group in that space.

titleCards.name: Pack-Dweller
titleCards.description:
After you strike with this skill, remove it from the adventure.
Strike 3

titleCards.name: Dwarf-Friend
titleCards.description:
You have the Dwarf trait.
During you turn, you may remove this skill from the adventure for you and another Dwarf to become emboldened.

titleCards.name: Word-Wielder
titleCards.description: When you or a nearby hero tests, you may remove this skill from the adventure to add 1 success and scout 1.

titleCards.name: Clue-Finder
titleCards.description: When you interact and test, you may remove this skill from the adventure to convert all fate to success.

titleCards.name: Stinging Fly
titleCards.description: At the start of your turn, you may remove this skill from the adventure to perform an attack and ignore all counter-attacks until the end of your turn.

titleCards.name: Wingfoot
titleCards.description:
After you sprint with this skill, remove it from the adventure.
Sprint 3

titleCards.name: Friend of Bears
titleCards.description:
After you guard with this skill, remove it from the adventure.
Guard 4

titleCards.name: Fire-Giver
titleCards.description: When you attack, you may remove this skill from the adventure to add a modifier of your choice.

titleCards.name: Gale-Rock
titleCards.description: Before a hero in your space suffers any amount of fear, you may remove this skill from the adventure for that hero to gain an equal amount of inspiration instead.

titleCards.name: Stormcrow
titleCards.description: At the start of your turn, you may remove this skill from the adventure to place your hero in a space with a threat token and interat with it without provoking attacks.

titleCards.name: Unfallen
titleCards.description:
After you rest with this skill, remove it from the adventure and become determined.
Rest 3

titleCards.name: Elf-Friend
titleCards.description:
You have the Elf trait.
During your turn, you may remove this skill from the adventure for you and another Elf to gain 2 inspiration.

titleCards.name: Coney-Foot
titleCards.description: After an enemy moves into a nearby space, you may remove this skill from the adventure to place your hero in a space with another hero without provoking attacks.

titleCards.name: Skin-Changer
titleCards.description:
After you hide with this skill, remove it from the adventure and become emboldened.
Hide

titleCards.name: Barrel Rider
titleCards.description: After you interact with a token and discard it, you may remove this skill from the adventure to place your hero in any space of an explored tile without provoking attacks.

titleCards.name: Flame-Bearer
titleCards.description: When a nearby enemy is attacked by another hero, you may remove this skill from the adventure to add 2 modifiers of your choice to that attack.

titleCards.name: Guest of Eagles
titleCards.description: At the start of your turn, you may remove this skill from the adventure to, without provoking attacks, either place your hero in another hero's space or place another hero in your space.

titleCards.name: Luckwearer
titleCards.description: After you deplete a trinket, you may remove this skill from the adventure to gain a boon of your choice and place 1 depletion token on that trinket.

titleCards.name: Lone-Survivor
titleCards.description: When you or a nearby hero performs a last stand, you may remove this skill from the adventure to add 2 success to the test.

titleCards.name: Nemesis
titleCards.description: When a nearby elite enemy activates, you may remove this skill from the adventure to become emboldened. If you do, that enemy cannot move or attack during its activation.

titleCards.name: Lore-Master
titleCards.description: Before you test, you may remove this skill from the adventure to scout 5.

titleCards.name: Ever-Wary
titleCards.description: When you prepare this skill, you may flip 1 fear facedown. You may remove this skill from the adventure to ignore all counter-attacks until the end of your turn.

titleCards.name: Treasure Seeker
titleCards.description: At the start of your turn, you may remove this skill from the adventure to place your hero in a space with a search token and interact with it without provoking attacks.

titleCards.name: Storyteller
titleCards.description: During your turn, you may remove this skill from the adventure for 2 heroes to gain inspiration equal to their inspiration limits.

titleCards.name: Dawn-Bringer
titleCards.description:
"Yet dawn is ever the hope of men."
- The Two Towers

titleCards.name: Undying
titleCards.description: When you would perform a last stand test, you may remove this skill from the adventure to gain 2 inspiration and discard 1 damage and 1 fear instead.

titleCards.name: Sly-Tongue
titleCards.description: Before you test, you may remove this skill from the adventure to test a stat of your choice instead and scout 1.

titleCards.name: Spirit-Bonded
titleCards.description:
During your turn, you may remove this skill from the adventure to attack an enemy and add smite.
Hide

titleCards.name: Friend of Gondor
titleCards.description:
You have the Human trait.
During your turn, you may remove this skill from the adventure for you and another Human to each discard 1 bane.

titleCards.name: Friend of Rohan
titleCards.description:
You have the Human trait.
During your turn, you may remove this skill from the adventure for you and another Human to each move 1 space.

titleCards.name: Beast-Singer
titleCards.description: At the end of your turn, you may remove this skill from the adventure for each hero to gain 1 inspiration for each creature in your play area.
